txt.en: While patrolling the western fields of the Broadacres for Torferth, you discovered many goblin-spearmen burning and pillaging. You should drive off the goblin-spearmen burning and pillaging in the Broadacres.
Goblin-spearmen may be found throughout the fields south of Torsbury.\n\nYou should drive off the goblin-spearmen burning and pillaging in the Broadacres.
While patrolling the western fields of the Broadacres for Torferth, you discovered many goblin-spearmen burning and pillaging.
You should drive off the goblin-spearmen burning and pillaging in the Broadacres
You should drive off the goblin-spearmen burning and pillaging in the Broadacres.
You found the badge of a goblin-captain on the corpse of one of your foes
